tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrafficData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    speed FLOAT,
    congestion_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE route_optimization (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    end_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    optimal_route VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    distance FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_patterns (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    route_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    congestion_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    distance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE congestion_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id UUID,
    congestion_level INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
